content: >choose the theme to customize the perfect bib and booties set - either sweet hearts or adorable teddy bears crochet the version you picture using preferred shades from lily sugar n cream or take the guesswork out and craft it as shown it s a thoughtful gift for any baby shower * yarnspirations * **skill level** intermediate **materials** lily® sugar n cream solids 70 9 g/ 2 5 oz/109 m/120 yds teddy set - -main color mc white 2 balls -contrast a lt blue 1 ball sweetheart set - -main color mc white 2 balls -contrast a pink 1 ball **additional materials** -1 button -1¼ yards 1 15 m of ¼ inch 6 5 mm ribbon color charts of the bear and heart are included in the pdf download lily / sugar n cream version 1 bernat version 2 1 https //www yarnspirations com/bernat-sweetheart-or-teddy-set/brc0238-006017m html 2 https //arnspirations com/bernat-sweetheart-or-teddy-set/brc0238-006017m html
